title: Hackathon a great success!
text: In October we held a hackathon in Barcelona. All of our 100+ attendees received a free Raspberry Pi 3B+ and Sense-HAT (along with some obligatory balena swag) to help make their ideas a reality. We all had an amazing day helping our guests to build some awesome projects.

title: New website
text: As part of our rename, we have launched a brand new website to bring together all our products under our new name. We’re all really proud of what our team has achieved and encourage you to take a look. We’ve brought together all the products you know and love such as balenaCloud (formerly resin.io), balenaEtcher (formerly Etcher) and now the balenaFin.
